articles.title: Justin Bieber Shares Surprise New Freedom EP: Listen
articles.description: He follows Justice with a six-song Easter release
articles.content: Justin Bieber has shared a surprise new EP called Freedom. The new EP arrives in time for Easter, and it features guest appearances from Tori Kelly, BEAM, Brandon Love, Chandler Moore, Pink Sweats, J… [+435 chars]

articles.title: War Bassist B.B. Dickerson Has Died at 71
articles.description: His bass line defined “Low Rider” and he contributed lead vocals to “The World Is a Ghetto”
articles.content: B.B. Dickerson, the bassist who was a co-founding member of the funk band War, has died. A representative confirmed to Billboard that Dickerson died at his home in Long Beach, California. He was 71.… [+478 chars]
